```{r load, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(Scillus)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

Load scRNA-seq raw data:

```{r echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=TRUE, results='asis'}
scRNA <- load_scfile(m)
```

`scRNA` is a list of multiple Seurat objects.

```{r echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=TRUE, results='asis', eval=FALSE}
length(scRNA)
```
